Wednesday night. Courtney Lee started for New York despite the death of his grandfather, Allen Iverson Desmond Courtney Lee , who was 92 when he passed away on Tuesday night. Courtney Lee considered skipping this game but changed his mind. I made the decision to stay here rather than going to St. Louis because I wanted to fill that role as team captain and leader of this team, said Courtney Lee , who added nine rebounds. Rep. Mike Pence arrived at Columbus in his east-central Indiana district for a town hall meeting, the sort of event that usually attracted a few dozen constituents. Surprised to see the hallway outside the room crowded with people, their arms folded and brows furrowed, Mike Pence shouted down the hall to an aide, asking him to get a janitor to open the room. The aide shouted back that the room was open- and overflowing. Congress had just passed the stimulus(
